title: Affordable Housing Community-Apps Being Accepted - 1/2BR
posting_body: Affordable housing--Rent based upon 30% of your adjusted household income.
If you are soon to be or are already in a housing transition - learn more about our affordable (multifamily) housing community options.
Andrews Place - 1BR suites (62+ or better) and Lakeway Place - 2BR suites (18+ or better).
Vacancy openings are filled from our waiting list.
Better to get your name on the wait list to be able to transition into an affordable housing community.
Not currently doing in-person face-to-face application appointments.
Please contact me for details on applications.
We would love to have you as a future resident in our community!!!
